mapper.select: select movie_set.*, moviehouse.movie_house_name, film.film_name, film.duration, cinema.cinema_name from movie_set, moviehouse, film, cinema where movie_set.ID = #{ID} and movie_set.movie_house_id = moviehouse.ID and movie_set.film_id = film.ID and moviehouse.cinema_ID = cinema.ID and movie_set.is_delete = 0

select movie_set.*, moviehouse.movie_house_name, film.film_name, film.duration, cinema.cinema_name from movie_set, moviehouse, film, cinema where film.film_name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') and movie_set.movie_house_id = moviehouse.ID and movie_set.film_id = film.ID and moviehouse.cinema_ID = cinema.ID and movie_set.is_delete = 0

SELECT count(*) FROM `movie_set` WHERE `movie_set`.movie_house_id = #{movieHouseID} and (#{movieStartTime} BETWEEN `movie_set`.movie_start_time and `movie_set`.movie_end_time or #{movieEndTime} BETWEEN `movie_set`.movie_start_time and `movie_set`.movie_end_time)
